thread.title: How Much Is That Luxury Home? It’s a Secret

author: Katherine Clarke
title: How Much Is That Luxury Home? It’s a Secret
text:
Real-estate developer Arnon Katz was searching for the mechanical system above his Manhattan penthouse when he discovered a huge, underused attic overhead. Four years later, with architectural plans in hand, he is marketing the space as a 10,000-square-foot triplex atop Hampshire House, located on Central Park South.
The asking price: Mr. Katz isn’t telling.
